mapper.select: SELECT re.application, ap.id AS application_id, re.channel_id, re.full_name, re.img_url, re.company_id, re.company FROM view_user_application re, synship.ct_application ap WHERE ap.application = re.application AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT DISTINCT application from com_user u, com_role r, com_user_role ur, view_role_application ap WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = r.id AND ap.id = r.id AND u.active =1 AND r.active = 1 AND u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t.* , rc.channel_id FROM ( SELECT re.* , u.id as user_id , u.user_account as user_account, r.id as role_id from com_resource re, com_res_role rr, com_role r, com_user_role ur, com_user u, Synship.ct_application ap WHERE re.active =1 AND r.active =1 AND u.active =1 AND ap.active = 1 AND re.id = rr.res_id AND rr.role_id = r.id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = u.id AND re.application = ap.application AND u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND re.application = #{application,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND res_type = 2 GROUP BY re.id, u.id, r.id
UNION
SELECT re.* , u.id as user_id , u.user_account as user_account, r.id as role_id from com_resource re , com_role r, com_role_config rc, com_user_role ur, com_user u , Synship.ct_application ap WHERE re.active =1 AND r.active =1 AND u.active =1 AND ap.active = 1 AND r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = u.id AND rc.role_id = r.id AND re.application = ap.application AND rc.cfg_name = 'all_permission' AND rc.cfg_val1 = re.application AND u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND re.application = #{application,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND res_type = 2 GROUP BY re.id, u.id, r.id ) t INNER JOIN view_role_channel rc ON t.role_id = rc.id
and rc.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY t.id, t.user_id,t.application

SELECT DISTINCT ch.channel_id FROM com_user u, com_user_role ur, com_role r, view_role_channel ch WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = r.id AND r.id = ch.id AND r.active =1 AND u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ch.channel_id, ch.full_name AS channel_name FROM com_user u INNER JOIN com_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} INNER JOIN com_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.active = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT r.id AS role_id, rc.cfg_val1 AS channel_id, ch.full_name AS full_name FROM voyageone_core.com_role r INNER JOIN voyageone_core.com_role_config rc ON (r.id = rc.role_id AND r.active = 1)
INNER JOIN synship.tm_order_channel ch ON (rc.cfg_val1 = ch.order_channel_id AND ch.active = 1 AND ch.order_channel_id <> '000')
WHERE rc.cfg_name = 'channel_id' GROUP BY r.id, ch.order_channel_id
UNION ALL
SELECT r.id AS role_id, ch.order_channel_id AS channel_id, ch.full_name AS full_name FROM voyageone_core.com_role r INNER JOIN voyageone_core.com_role_config rc ON (r.id = rc.role_id AND r.active = 1)
INNER JOIN synship.tm_order_channel ch ON (ch.active = 1 AND ch.order_channel_id <> '000')
WHERE rc.cfg_name = 'channel_id' AND rc.cfg_val1 = 'ALL' GROUP BY r.id, ch.order_channel_id ) ch ON r.id = ch.role_id
